ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:21:26 [Issue ID 4000-666823] urn:comicvine:4000-666823 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 02:01:31. [Issue ID 1820525]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Now there’s two Vampblade’s on a mission to redo the original’s battle against the other-dimensional Glarkian parasites. Can the two see eye to eye long enough to take the fight beyond themselves? Or is Detroit still doomed to be overcome with a super-secret space vampire invasion?!
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including two covers from Dan Mendoza (Zombie Tramp, DollFace)!!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------|---------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Marcelo Costa | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Costa | 2 | | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Bill McKay | 3 | | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Bill McKay | 4 | | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 6 |
*Notes* Overall issue #27. The digital edition (4/18/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Title: Down the Vamp Hole Part Two
